title: 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 580 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Consumer Protection Act 2007
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Consumer Protection Act 2007 

(Grocery Goods Undertakings) (Revocation) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited consumer protection act 2007 (grocery good undertakings) (revocation) regulation 2022

title: 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 580 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of April
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of April
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 1st day april

title: 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 580 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 580 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. The following Regulations are revoked:
text_raw:
3. The following Regulations are revoked: 

Consumer Protection Act 2007 (Grocery Goods Undertakings) Regulations 
2016 (S.I. No. 35 of 2016). 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 30 March 2022 

ROBERT TROY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [150] 3
text_norm: 3 following regulation revoked consumer protection act 2007 (grocery good undertakings) regulation 2016 (s.i no 35 2016) given hand 30 march 2022 robert troy minister state department enterprise trade employment notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st april 2022 150 3

title: 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 580 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations revoke the Consumer Protection Act 2007 (Grocery Goods 
Undertakings) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 35 of 2016).
